alert.note: Alert for Huerfano; Las Animas; Otero; Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued January 17 at 5:34PM MST until January 17 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Southwestern Otero County in southeastern Colorado... Northeastern Huerfano County in southeastern Colorado... North central Las Animas County in southeastern Colorado... Southeastern Pueblo County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 600 PM MST. * At 534 PM MST, a dangerous snow squall was located 19 miles west of Delhi, or 38 miles north of Trinidad, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Intense bursts of heavy snow and gusty winds leading to blowing snow and rapidly falling visibility. Wind gusts up to 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Travel will become difficult and potentially dangerous within minutes. Locations impacted include... Tyrone, Delhi and Thatcher. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow Down! Rapid changes in visibility and road conditions are expected with this dangerous snow squall. Be alert for sudden whiteout conditions.
